channel.title: Need webclient help!
channel.description:
Hello, i need help with making a webclient so can someone please help me asap(and if in wrong section soz please move, cause this is client help...)
Details: The Client Is Up, Up On The Site, But, I Get A White Screen with A Big X on it, and then i click for details, it says the problem is :
Reading certificates from 10412 http://apocalyptism.org/signed.jar | C:\Users\Kim\AppData\LocalLow\Sun\Java\Deployment\cache\6.0\6\5a7f2946-328169ce.idx Reading certificates from 10412 http://apocalyptism.org/signed.jar | C:\Users\Kim\AppData\LocalLow\Sun\Java\Deployment\cache\6.0\6\5a7f2946-328169ce.idx No music found. Reading certificates from 10412 http://apocalyptism.org/signed.jar | C:\Users\Kim\AppData\LocalLow\Sun\Java\Deployment\cache\6.0\6\5a7f2946-328169ce.idx LULULULLULULULLULULULLULULULLULULULLULULULLULULULload: class client.class not found. java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2ClassLoader.loadCode(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager.createApplet(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Plugin2Manager$AppletExecutionRunnable.run(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) Caused by: java.io.IOException: open HTTP connection failed:http://www.ninjascape.smffy.com/client/class.class at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.getBytes(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source) at sun.plugin2.applet.Applet2ClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) ... 7 more Exception: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client.class
I Dont know how to fix that, thats what i need help with, so if possible, can someone please leave a comment, or add me on msn, or skype, ASAP
Msn-Tyler_chief@hotmail.com Skype-tyler9163

item.title: Need webclient help!
item.dc:creator: @TncNinja TncNinja
item.description:
@TncNinja wrote:

Hello, i need help with making a webclient so can someone please help me asap(and if in wrong section soz please move, cause this is client help…)

Details:
The Client Is Up, Up On The Site, But, I Get A White Screen with A Big X on it, and then i click for details, it says the problem is :

Reading certificates from 10412 http://apocalyptism.org/signed.jar | C:\Users\Kim\AppData\LocalLow\Sun\Java\Deployment\cache\6.0\6\5a7f2946-328169ce.idx

LULULULLULULULLULULULLULULULLULULULLULULULLULULULload: class client.class not found.

… 7 more

I Dont know how to fix that, thats what i need help with, so if possible, can someone please leave a comment, or add me on msn, or skype, ASAP
